meanings.definition: Having or showing a kind and sympathetic nature.
meanings.sent1: She is a kindhearted person who always helps others in need.
meanings.sent2: The kindhearted nurse comforted the scared child in the hospital.
meanings.sent3: The kindhearted teacher made sure all her students had enough pencils for the test.
meanings.sent4: His kindhearted actions were like a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The kindhearted old man fed the stray cats every evening without fail.

meanings.sent1: The kindhearted neighbor baked cookies for everyone on the street.
meanings.sent2: People appreciate her kindhearted nature and willingness to lend a hand.
meanings.sent3: The kindhearted boss surprised the team with an unexpected day off.
meanings.sent4: Her kindhearted smile lit up the room and made everyone feel welcome.
meanings.sent5: The kindhearted donation helped many families in need during the holidays.
